name: Diablo
description:
This script will install "Diablo" CD edition with DevilutionX Linux native 64 bits port. It has multiplayer  and  others new features/corrected bugs. 
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses DevilutionX: https://github.com/diasurgical/devilutionX
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes: - Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
custom-name: Diablo - DevilutionX
files:
- dvltx: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Diablo/devilutionx-linux-64.tar.gz
game:
  exe: devilutionx/devilutionx.sh
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: diabdat.mpq
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/devilutionx
    file: dvltx
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/devilutionx
    src: $DISC/diabdat.mpq
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/devilutionx/devilutionx.sh
